name: Chaosmare
description:
This game was made in 3 days for Mini Jam 105: Dreamy.

////////////////////////////////////////

Note: I totally forgot to change the name lol but it still works.

////////////////////////////////////////

Chaosmare is a game where you play a piece of candy, who is super confused/bewildered (hence chaos in some way), and needs to find a way out of this odd but peaceful dream world.

How To Play (since I didn't have time to include it):

A & D or <- & -> is movement

Space bar is jump

How to wall jump:

While not on ground, hold movement key that is into the direction of the wall you are against. Then, press the jump key.

Tools Used:

-SFXR

-Aesprite

-Godot 3

-Jummbox 2.5

#minijam
